physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Length at 50th percentile, weight at 75th percentile, head circumference at 35th percentile, widening of the metaphyses of both wrists and ankles, bilateral genu varum.
Refusal to walk reported by mother.
Received second dose of vitamin D2.
Complained of leg pain when going up stairs, tiredness with walking.
Leg bracing initiated, extensive bowing of bilateral lower extremities noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Height below the 1.2 percentile, growth deceleration observed.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Short stature affecting mainly lower extremities, increased upper to lower segment ratio, interpatellar measurement at 15 cm.
Normal renal ultrasound, persistent high normal to slightly elevated ionized calcium level.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Normalization of intact PTH and alkaline phosphatase noted after dosage adjustment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Height improved to the fifth percentile.
